author: Douglas Yu, Senior Contributor
title: Food And Beverage M&A Deals Roundup: RTD Coffee, Premium Spirits And Sauces
description: M&A activity in the U.S. food and drinks market continues to pick up, as evidenced by several notable transactions in the ready-to-drink coffee and premium sectors.

author: Jessi Bang
title: Every day is sundae at this new St. George ice cream and coffee shop
description: ST. GEORGE —Whether you’re taking the family for ice cream or getting late-night sweets after a tipsy bar night, this new ice cream and coffee shop has the scoop. What once was a historic sheriff’s office next to a jailhouse is now home to Bee Sweet Ice Cream and Coffee, a business owned by 19-year-old […]

author: Belinda Jackson
title: An expert expat’s guide to Austin, Texas
description: The founders of Collingwood’s Proud Mary Coffee know just where to go for a summer dip, a Mexican feast, and unsurprisingly, a deluxe cup o’ Joe.

author: Catherine McDonald
title: Queen Street West coffee shop frustrated by repeated robberies, suspect in custody
description: Cesario Ginjo grew up not far from the coffee shop and bakery he owns on Queen West, and says he loves the neighborhood. But lately, running a business there has been difficult.

author: Mark Naglazas
title: La vita bella: Can the Hay Street Mall reinvent itself as a cafe strip?
description: An Italian-style coffee shop is flourishing amidst the closed shops and gloom of the Hay Street Mall. Can it pave the way for a European-style café strip and foodie destination?
